name: Marlene Shadow & Light
description:
This piece displays differently dependant on the time of day. At midday, Marlene's light side is dominant. At midnight, her full shadow. Revealing the constellations as they were seen in Paris on 6th May 1992, the night she died.

We all have a shadow and light to ourselves, each revealing itself in time. 

Code by Liam Egan @neuromantic6
